bill_title: establish the crime of possession of a weapon or tools with intent to commit theft and to provide a penalty therefor.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to establish the crime of possession of a weapon or tools with intent to commit theft and to provide a penalty therefor. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 22-30A be amended with a NEW SECTION: Any person who possesses any weapon or instrument specifically designed, adapted, or adopted for the commission of a theft or any explosive useful for the commission of a theft, with the intent to commit a theft, is guilty of a Class 1 misdemeanor.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
